-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Bindings to system UUID functions.
--   
--   Bindings to the native UUID generator for a number of platforms.
--   Please contact the author if your platform is not supported.
@package system-uuid
@version 2.1.1


-- | The <a>UUID</a> datatype.
module Data.UUID

-- | A type for Uniform Unique Identifiers. The <a>Num</a> instance allows
--   <a>UUID</a>s to be specified with <tt>0</tt>, <tt>1</tt>, &amp;c. --
--   testing for the null <a>UUID</a> is easier that way. The
--   <a>Storable</a> instance is compatible with most (all?) systems'
--   native representation of <a>UUID</a>s.
data UUID
asWord64s :: UUID -> (Word64, Word64)
asWord32s :: UUID -> (Word32, Word32, Word32, Word32)
instance Typeable UUID
instance Eq UUID
instance Ord UUID
instance Hashable64 UUID
instance Hashable32 UUID
instance Binary UUID
instance Bounded UUID
instance Storable UUID
instance IsString UUID
instance Read UUID
instance Show UUID


-- | Utilities for fetching the results from foreign functions.
module System.UUID.FromForeign

-- | Allocates a pointer to capture the output of a foreign function, runs
--   the function and interprets the sixteen bytes following the pointer as
--   a UUID.
runAndRead :: (Ptr CChar -> IO ()) -> IO UUID


-- | Version 4 <tt>UUID</tt> utilities.
module System.UUID.V4
uuid :: IO UUID


-- | Version 1 <tt>UUID</tt> utilities.
module System.UUID.V1
uuid :: IO UUID
